movie.title: Genesis: The Creation and the Flood
movie.title_english: Genesis: The Creation and the Flood
movie.title_long: Genesis: The Creation and the Flood (1994)
movie.description_intro: An all-enveloping darkness. Suddenly, a child's voice, frightened, questioning, pierces the darkness... The first flickering rays of light begin to sculpt mysterious shapes out of the darkness ... Among them, a very old man. He reassures the child, exhorting him to see the wonders of the earth. And it is with this child's eyes that we will witness the creation of the world. Nature comes to life at the first light of dawn, recreating the seven days of the Creation. Adam appears, and is soon joined by Eve. Paradise could be theirs, but as time goes by, they grow restless, inquisitive... They approach the Tree of Knowledge - and discover pain, suffering and mortality. Their sons Cain and Abel play out a story that will continue to darken the Creation until the end of time. And angered by the corruption of Cain's progeny, by the lust and greed ruling the cities, God vows to wipe away his creatures and begin anew. With Noah and his family. The ark is built, the animals led into their pens,...

movies.title: End Game
movies.summary: A secret Service agent and a news reporter investigate the conspiracy behind the assassination of the President.
movies.description_full: A secret Service agent and a news reporter investigate the conspiracy behind the assassination of the President.
movies.synopsis: A secret Service agent and a news reporter investigate the conspiracy behind the assassination of the President.

movies.title: That Awkward Moment
movies.summary: Jason has just been dumped, but he didn't even realize they were going out. Meanwhile, Mikey's wife has just asked him for a divorce, and perpetually single Daniel is still single. The three best friends are determined to stay single together and just have fun. But then Jason meets Ellie who just might be perfect for him, Daniel starts to realize that his gal pal Chelsea might be perfect for him, and Mikey has always thought that his wife was perfect for him. The boys are going to have to juggle their single life with their romantic entanglements and it's going to get awkward.

movies.title: The Last Will and Testament of Rosalind Leigh
movies.title_english: The Last Will and Testament of Rosalind Leigh
movies.title_long: The Last Will and Testament of Rosalind Leigh (2012)
movies.summary: An antiques collector inherits a house from his estranged mother only to discover that she had been living in a shrine devoted to a mysterious cult. Soon, he comes to suspect that his mother's oppressive spirit still lingers within her home and is using items in the house to contact him with an urgent message.

movies.title: The Last Movie Star
movies.summary: An aging former movie star is forced to face the reality that his glory days are behind him. On its surface, the film is a tale about faded fame. At its core, it's a universal story about growing old.
movies.description_full: An aging former movie star is forced to face the reality that his glory days are behind him. On its surface, the film is a tale about faded fame. At its core, it's a universal story about growing old.
